name: Glucerna - Sr Powder Tin
description: Glucerna SR is a complete, balanced low-calorie meal replacement and/or healthy snack alternative. It is formulated with slow release energy systems shown to optimize glycemic response, a healthy mono-unsaturated fatty acid (MUFA) lipid system and fiber. Glucerna SR is sucrose free and provides high quality protein. Ensure has balanced macronutrient ratio supporting optimum protein utilization. It is free of gluten & lactose. Can be consumed orally as well as by tube feeding. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
